author: wsjcom
title: Engaged or Divorced, Young or Old: Planning Can’t Be One Size Fits All
text:
Joan Antoniello • Principal at Mazars Wealth Advisors, New York • Education: B.A., Wagner College • Professional designations: Chartered Life Underwriter, Chartered Financial Consultant, Certification in Long-Term Care, Retirement Income Certified Professional
Background: Ms. Antoniello worked in retail banking and the insurance industry before becoming a financial adviser 10 years ago. “I enjoy working with people, helping them, and then seeing results for them a few years later,” she says.
...
